data.name: Venice
data.description:
Take that amazing real boat trip through Canal Grande in Venice, Italy without leaving your home, even without leaving your couch!
Nice VR experience and beautiful memories if you already were there or if not, gain experience as if you are there.

no comment - no statement - no argument - no judgement

No moderation - this is no documentation und no reportage.

You will enjoy the destination like a normal tourist and you will feel the urban atmosphere with all the crowds and the soundscape of the city.

Get the real feeling in that place and take time to beam directly to Canal Grande.

You will pass all the famous old buildings and see the boats, water taxis and gondolas on the water. The tour goes from main station St. Lucia to famous San Marco Square (Piazza San Marco) with Campanile Tower. You will see also the Rialto Bridge.

You travel with the real official Venetian public waterbus just like any tourist arriving in Venice by train and you can see both sides of the Grand Canal.
